ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلْقِىَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُلْقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'Musa, will you throw first or shall we be the ones to throw?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So they said: "O Moses, you may cast your spell first, or we shall cast ours."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then they said: 'O Moses, will you [first] throw your rod, or shall we throw?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The magicians asked Moses, "Will you throw your staff first or shall we?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “O Moosa! You may throw first – or shall we be the first to throw?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "O Musa! Either you throw (first), or shall we have the (first) throw"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: O Musa! will you cast, or shall we be the first to cast?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Moses, wilt thou cast, or shall we be the casters?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: O Moses! Either throw (first) or let us be the first throwers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "Moses, will you first throw, or shall we?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: O Musa! either thou cast down, or we shall be the ones to cast down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘O Moses, will you throw [first], or shall we throw?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "O Moses! wilt thou throw (first), or shall we have the (first) throw?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "O Musa (Moses)! Either you throw (first), or shall we have the (first) throw?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They said: 'Moses, will you throw first or shall we be the throwers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “O Moses! Either you throw, or we are the ones to throw.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "O Moses, either you throw [your staff], or we will be the ones to throw [first]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:115] They said, ‘O Moses, either you cast, your staff, or we shall be the casters!’, of what we have.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: Moses! Either throw) first (or let us be the first throwers)?
